abstract: |
  We review existing temporal taggers, and compare their abilities in recognizing and normalizing temporal expressions in text coming from various languages and sources. HeidelTime, SUTime, and Dateparser are the chosen parsers. They will be reproduced, and evaluated on a set of corpora used in previous temporal recognizing and extraction challenges.
